mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Caroline Maria Calvert, to Elizabeth Bordley Gibson, 1820 November 11
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Calvert, Caroline Maria, 1800-1842
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sorry to have missed seeing her yesterday -- Mama is convalescing -- she and sister must refuse invitation to tea because of a previous engagement -- Eugenia [Calvert] & America [Peter] invited someone to tea -- Papa also has a previous engagement with Mr. Camac. Autograph letter signed, 2 pages, integral address panel, black seal inscribed "Caroline", watermark (6 pointed star).
